name: BlackDuckHubScan
description: Execute a Black Duck Hub scan against your build
author: Black Duck Software, Inc.
instanceNameFormat: Execute a Black Duck Hub scan against your build $(message)

inputs.name: BlackDuckHubService
inputs.label: Black Duck Hub Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Black Duck end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Black Duck Hub'

inputs.name: HubScanTarget
inputs.label: Scan Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: If left blank, the the location of the 'BUILD_SOURCESDIRECTORY' environment variable will be scanned

inputs.name: HubFailOnPolicyViolation
inputs.label: Fail the Build for Hub Policy Violations

inputs.name: HubScanTimeout
inputs.label: Scan Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: In minutes (set to zero for no timeout.)
